column4: hey i can't log in, i restarted my comouter, and when i put in my credentials it logs in and then comes back to the log in screen...ive tried all the options to login and none will work, any ideas?
are you getting a graphical login?
when it logs in it shows a NVIDA display icon and then brings me rightback to the login screen
nope, none at all after i log in and the NVIDA screen, it brings me back to wehre i enter my username, but no messages
try opening a console and login (Alt+F1)
nothing comes up when i pess alt+F1
try opening a console and login (control+alt+f1) then you can switch back to your grapical login using con+alt+f7
sounds like its a problem with your graphics drivers
errr... i'm no expert in that, but you can tell people that you can login via the console
thanks for the help in finding out what it was
you might try that first command sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)
do it from the console after logging in
